snippet.title: Citadelum | Battles Trailer
snippet.description:
New Citadelum trailer featuring defense and battles. Recruit, train and deploy guards to defend your city against enemy attacks. Prepare your legions for epic confrontations: select your units and formation in the battlefield and fight for the glory of Rome in tactical auto battle system. Finally, have a sneak peak on gladiator training and fighting in the arena. Citadelum is the city building / strategy game set in Ancient Rome. 
Enjoy three layered gameplay: building and managing core, exploration, trade and battles in a world map, and the gods in the pantheon. 
Citadelum will be released for PC in 2024
